user_question: Can you find a unique dessert recipe that uses lavender and generate an image of it?
final_answer: Lavender lemon tart recipe: 1 cup flour, 0.5 cup butter, 0.25 cup sugar, 1 tbsp dried lavender, 2 eggs, 1 cup lemon juice, 1 cup sugar, 1 tbsp lemon zest. Image of lavender lemon tart generated. To infuse lavender flavor, steep dried lavender in warm cream or milk, then strain before using in the recipe.
